import {includes,isString} from "lodash";
import React from "react";
import { cx } from "emotion";
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import getChildren from "../utils/children";
 
import {Icon} from "./icon";
 
import getHeaderStyle from "../styles/header/header.style";
import getImageStyle from "../styles/header/header-image.style";
import getIconStyle from "../styles/header/header-icon.style";
import getContentStyle from "../styles/header/header-content.style";
import getSubheadStyle from "../styles/header/sub-header.style";
 
 
const sizes = ["huge", "large", "medium", "small", "tiny"];
 
export function Header(props) {
 
  const {
    level: _level,
    size: _size,
    text,
    theme,
    textAlign,
    subtext,
    image,
    icon,
    iconAlign,
    dividing,
    block,
    variation,
    inverted,
    banner,
    ...otherProps
  } = props;
 
 
  const level = includes(["1","2","3","4","5"],`${_level}`) ? `${_level}` : "1";
  const component = `h${level}`;
 
  const size = includes(sizes, _size) ? _size : undefined;
 
  const iconRight = (icon || image) && (iconAlign === "right");
  const iconLeft = (icon || image) && !iconRight;
 
  const rightAligned = textAlign === "right";
  const centerAligned = textAlign === "center";
  const justified = textAlign === "justified";
  const leftAligned = !(rightAligned || centerAligned || justified);
 
  const styleFlags = {
    withImage: !!image,
    withIcon: !!icon && !image,
    withSubtext: !!subtext,
    inverted,
    dividing: dividing && !block && !banner,
    block: block && !banner,
    banner,
    iconLeft,
    iconRight,
    rightAligned,
    leftAligned,
    justified,
    centerAligned,
  };
  
  let content = getChildren(props);
 
  if (content.length === 0) {
    content.push(text || "-");
  }
  Eif (content.length === 1 && isString(content[0])) {
    content[0] = <span key="text">{content[0]}</span>;
  }
 
  if (props.subtext) {
    const subtextClass = cx("cm-subhead", getSubheadStyle(styleFlags, variation,component, size));
    content.push(
      <div key="subhead" className={subtextClass}>
        {subtext}
      </div>
    );
  }
 
  if (image || icon || subtext) {
    const contentClass = cx("cm-header-content", getContentStyle(styleFlags, variation, component, size));
    content = [(
      <div key="content" className={contentClass}>
        {content}
      </div>
    )];
    if (image || icon) {
      let img;
      if (image) {
        const imageClass = cx("cm-header-image", getImageStyle(styleFlags, variation, component, size));
        // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/alt-text
        img = <img key="img" role="presentation" src={image} aria-hidden="true" className={imageClass} />;
      }
      else Eif (icon) {
        const iconClass = cx("cm-header-icon", getIconStyle(styleFlags, variation, component, size));
        img = (
          <i key="icon" className={iconClass} aria-hidden="true">
            <Icon icon={icon} />
          </i>
        );
      }
 
      if (rightAligned) {
        content.push(img);
      }
      else if (iconRight) {
        content.push(img);
      }
      else {
        content.unshift(img);
      }
    }
  }
 
 
  const newProps = mergeProps({
    className: cx("cm-header",getHeaderStyle(styleFlags,variation,component,size)),
  },otherProps);
 
  return React.createElement(component,newProps,content);
 
}
 
Header.propTypes = {
  level: PropTypes.number,
  text: PropTypes.string,
  theme: PropTypes.string,
  textAlign: PropTypes.oneOf(["left","right","center","justified"]),
  subtext: PropTypes.string,
  image: PropTypes.string,
  icon: PropTypes.any,
  iconAlign: PropTypes.string,
  size: PropTypes.oneOf(sizes),
  dividing: PropTypes.bool,
  block: PropTypes.bool,
  variation: PropTypes.variation,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool,
  banner: PropTypes.bool,
};
 
Header.defaultProps = {
  level: 1,
};
 
 
export function BannerHeader(props) {
 
  return <Header banner {...props} />;
 
}
